trans-unit.source: Folder where the configuration file is located.: Possible paths: 1) Absolute (/var/www/shared/in2publish/), 2) Relative (typo3conf/AdditionalConfiguration/) 3) Extension source (EXT:in2publish_conf/Resources/Private/Config/) 4) Config folder (CONF:in2publish_core/) (Default)

Disable UserTS configuration.: Parts of the Content Publisher configurations can be overwritten individually on a per user basis. This is done by setting values per UserTS. If you tick this box the UserTS for the Content Publisher will be ignored.

Log level.: The log level determines the lower bound of severity for log entries to be written. Selecting a "higher" log level reduces the amount of logs and information being written to the database.
Select the remote connection adapter. Defaults to ssh.
Select the file transmission adapter. Defaults to ssh.
Collect and show all queries in the debugger in the Backend.
